com.ojcoleman.europa.configurable

Class Observable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ojcoleman.europa.configurable.Observable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConfigurableBase

    public abstract class Observable
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple implementation of the Subject part of the Observer pattern.
    Author:
    O. J. Coleman
    See Also:
    Observer

      • removeEventListener

        public void removeEventListener(Observer listener)

      • fireEvent

        protected void fireEvent(java.lang.Object event)
        Notifies all observers of the given event or change.
        Parameters:
        event - The type of event or change. This should generally be tied to a constant or enum defined in the Subject sub-class.
        See Also:
        Observer, addEventListener(Observer)

      • fireEvent

        protected void fireEvent(java.lang.Object event,
             java.lang.Object state)
        Notifies all observers of the given event or change.
        Parameters:
        event - The type of event or change. This should generally be tied to a constant or enum defined in the Subject sub-class.
        state - An arbitrary object typically describing the current state of the Observable or information about the event.
        See Also:
        Observer, addEventListener(Observer)
